messages.subject: Files Reminder from the List Wench
messages.msgSnippet: A reminder for old list members and a bit of FYI for those of you who ve just joined us (belated welcome!) It would be most helpful  if you could upload text
messages.messageBody:
A reminder for "old" list members and a bit of FYI for those of you
who've just joined us (belated welcome!)

It would be most helpful if you could upload text based
information/files to the group "Files" area and anything having to do
with images to the the "Photos" section.

I've been going through and trying to gather the entries as they come in
to put together pages for the website's "Facts" section. Hopefully I
will have something up there by the time the weekend rolls around.

Thank you .

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
